data.post_excerpt: Angelys is extracted from the roots of Angelica acutiloba in Hokkaido and developed to disperse melanin in Keratinocytes. Angelys activates cathepsins, protease enzymes in lysosomal bags
data.inci_name: Water (and) Butylene Glycol (and) Angelica Acutiloba Root Extract
product_description_logged: Angelys is extracted from the roots of Angelica acutiloba in Hokkaido and developed to disperse melanin in Keratinocytes. Angelys activates cathepsins, protease enzymes in lysosomal bags. Once reduced they digest the membrane of melanosomes (the bag of melanin) and disperse the melanin in the cell so the melanin becomes invisible to the eyes. When tested at 0.065%, Angelys increased Cathepsin K by 72%.

data.post_excerpt: Barsolve NS-100 is a multi-functional Polyglyceryl Fatty Acid Ester. This unique ingredient can function as a D-Phase emulsifier which are high internal phase emulsions with a small particle size
product_description_logged: Barsolve NS-100 is a multi-functional Polyglyceryl Fatty Acid Ester. This unique ingredient can function as a D-Phase emulsifier which are high internal phase emulsions with a small particle size. Once applied on the skin it melts into an oil and upon rinsing the oil self-emulsifies with water for easy rinsing. D-Phase emulsions can be easily dispersed into aqueous bases sebum cleanser or a natural solubilizer. It can also be dispersed into an aqueous gel to create a simple emulsion with low emulsifier content. D-Phase Emulsions are typically translucent gels (depending on the refractive index of the oil) that can contain up to 95% oil.

data.post_excerpt: Lecinol S-10 is a unique phospholipid emulsifier comprised mainly of Phosphatidylcholine which is the primary phospholipid found in the cell membrane of cells located in the epidermis. Lecinol S-10 creates an Oil-in-Water (O/W) emulsion in which some oil droplets have a lipid bilayer surrounding them which mimics the structure of the skin
product_description_logged: Lecinol S-10 is a unique phospholipid emulsifier comprised mainly of Phosphatidylcholine which is the primary phospholipid found in the cell membrane of cells located in the epidermis. Lecinol S-10 creates an Oil-in-Water (O/W) emulsion in which some oil droplets have a lipid bilayer surrounding them which mimics the structure of the skin. It is a very potent emulsifier, stabilizing emulsions at low concentrations. Lecinol S-10 works to replenish the main phospholipid of the epidermis while also reducing skin damage, reducing irritation, reducing melanin synthesis, and increasing active deposition, strengthening the skin barrier, and providing instant and long term moisturization.

One in 3 women age 25 to 40 say they are affected by the regular appearance of acne-type lesions or cutaneous blemishes. Cutaneous blemishes reflect a reduction in anti-microbial protection and imbalance in the cutaneous microbiota. SeaBiome is a fermented marine postbiotic to reblance the bacterial ecosystem.
